Text: My bad.. This is actually a DVD ISO of the movie.  Not a rip.

I was just really tierd when I posted this.  It's made into ISO with DVD decrypter.  Since the running time is like 12-17mins, the actual DVD ISO is only 750MB or so uncompressed.  

This is not a DIVX or XVID or OGM.  It's just a regular DVD that you will burn with Nero or DVD Decrypter.  

So this is in the correct catagory.  I just made a mistake explaining.  ( I meant DVD rip as made into ISO.)

Am I the only one whos trying to DL it and without a seeder or leechers?

Thanks for the upload !
I had to restart my PC.  I'm actually going to be away for the week, so if my PC crashes or my modems dies, it won't start to reseed until Friday or so.
